All Classes

Class
Description
AbstractGridNode
Implementation of GridNode.
CtrlNode
An example 'controller' node.
Event
An event triggering a state transition.
GridNode
The extension of Observer required by the rendezvous pattern.
Guard
A guard is a condition checked at the entrance of a State, just before calling the state Procedure, i.e., the procedure will only be called if the guard returns true.
Main
Use this class main(...) method to run a very minimalistic example of use of the Rendezvous pattern as implemented here.
Observable<P extends Observer>
A class that can send messages about its state to Observers of the specified type.
Observer
An interface for objects that can observe an Observable, i.e.
Procedure
Actions undertaken when changing state.
RendezvousProcess
Any action that must be executed at a rendezvous.
RvgridException
The Exception class specific to this library.
RVMessage
Data exchanged between two GridNodes at rendezvous.
RVMessageHeader
Message header for rendezvous messages.
SimNode
An example 'simulator' node.
State
A discrete state characteristic of a state machine.
StateMachine
A finite state-machine.
StateMachineController
A class able to understand a state machine and send it relevant messages.
StateMachineEngine<O extends GridNode>
Implementation of a universal finite-state machine.
StateMachineObserver
A interface for objects able to understand the various states of a StateMachine.
Transition
A transition between two states.
